# Morocco Travel App - Copilot Instructions

This is a React TypeScript web application for Morocco travel with automatic translation features and guide information.

## Project Structure
- React with TypeScript for the frontend
- Tailwind CSS for styling
- Internationalization support for multiple languages
- Translation features for Arabic, French, and Berber languages
- Tourist guide information and cultural content
- Map integration for navigation

## Development Guidelines
- Use TypeScript for type safety
- Follow React best practices with functional components and hooks
- Implement responsive design with Tailwind CSS
- Structure components in a modular way
- Include error handling and loading states
- Optimize for mobile devices

## Features to Implement
- Real-time translation between languages
- Tourist attraction information
- Cultural guide content
- Interactive maps
- Offline functionality
- User preferences and favorites
